title: Skiphs' Blood
summaries: Skiphs' Blood is a Hardmode dye rewarded from a Hardmode boss's Treasure Bag along with Skiphs' set. It can also be a random reward from the Dye Trader for completing a Strange Plant quest after the Moon Lord has been defeated. When equipped, it gives the player a dark purple tone, also adding a shimmering purple effect to the player's body.

statistics.Sell: 3 GC
